reviews.sentence: Dad and two children. The staff was extremely friendly and respectful. Very clean place and we enjoyed our stayNewly renovated room the TV was extremely crooked and the toilet ran about every 20 minutes. The WiFi was weak in our room and please invest in a higher quality toilet paper.

Updated rooms are very nice. Hotel offered us a night in one of the updated rooms. Very nice. Loved the workout room both times we stayed. Pool was a reasonable temperature this time. Most of all I appreciate very much that the hotel listened to our feedback and took the time to respond. Would definitely stay here again.

Great Location for business or family. What is not to like being adjacent to the Easton Town Center. There is plenty to do and plenty places to eat when you stay at this hotel that are within walking distance. I stayed in a newly refurbished room that was very clean and modern.

Nicely appointed room. Our room was newly remodeled and was excellent. Especially liked the walk in shower and heated mirror in bathroom. The breakfast is top notch and plenty of parking is available. Very convenient for a weekend shopping experience at Easton.

I was unprepared for how nice this property was. When I learned that an academic conference I needed to attend was scheduled here my thought was seriously. Not even downtownjBoy was I wrong. This hotel is situated in one of the nicest parts of Ohio within walking distance to many many restaurants and upscale shopping. The hotel itself is beautiful and recently renovated with a real restaurant and service that warrants 4 or more stars. Staff has been trained to smile greet their guests and engage them in conversation. My room was exceptionally quiet comfortable and on the executive floor. I thought the restaurant was just a bit on the pricey side but the linens were crisp and white and the food tasty. An added bonus is that the restaurant opened at 6 am great as I needed to begin work at 715 each day. This hotel is beta testing the Hilton Digital Key and I was very impressed with how it worked and simplified my stay. After spending last week at the Union Station Double Tree in St Louis and this week at the Columbus Ohio Hilton at Easton. I am forever spoiled from setting foot in another Hampton InThis is an exceptional hotel with exceptional staff with plenty of free parking although valet is available as is an airport shuttle. Enjoy.

Love the renovations. Once again Easton Hilton does not disappoint. Stayed We d Saturday for business and was very pleased with renovations to the overall room and bathroom. Love the new walk in shower amazing shower head. The beds are very updated with reading lights the art and the linens were very modern. Room service as always was fast and yummy. Great stay on the 3rd floor.

Had a recently remodeled room absolutely gorgeous. Was comfortable beautiful area right next door to the beautiful Easton area with all the restaurants and shopping. Staff was very friendly and efficient.

Excellent. very nice stay rooms updated and very comfortable. very responsive if need a change to the room. Luxury room and stay within walking of so many shopping and eating areas. This is a recommended hotel to anyone coming to the area.

Walking distance Easton. Within walking distance to the Funny Bone. The remodeled rooms look great. The rooms were spacious. We had a great view of Easton. Nice to have the bar lounge downstairs. I had left my wallet while checking in and the front desk ran strait up to the room to give it to me. Great service. You can tell the staff cares about their guests. Plenty of places to eat at in the area.
Newly remodeled excellent condition friendly staff. Great shopping nearby and restaurants. Would recommend.

Not really an airport hotel. No shuttle availability early morning. Also extensive renovations taking place. Not really disclosed on the website as to the amount taking place. This hotel will be very nice eventually. Just not so at the moment.

Great property. Even during a major renovation this hotel was first class. I stay there at least once a year and am in hotels about 2 3 days a week. I have seen good service and not so good. This property offers doormen with valet service and always has helpful staff somewhere close by when you need them.

12th year of meeting 14 college friends for Thanksgiving weekend at the Hilton. All my friends have enjoyed the yearly weekend at the Hilton To open the holiday season for the past 14 years The staff was excellent as always but the hotel was under remodeling which greatly interfered with our stay no dinning room no fireplaces etc.

Christmas Party 2016. The Hilton at Easton is the nicest hotel in Columbus Ohio. My wife and I have been celebrating Christmas Parties here for years. Although this year when we checked in it was at a make shift check in desk as they are remodeling and upgrading for the future. I was very disappointed to fined the pool and hot tub was closed. I was also disappointed in the first room they assigned us. I called the room they gave us the basement room because of the smallish window near the ceiling and the poor view. I told Taylor at the front desk that this was not going to work for our Christmas Party stay and she went to work to find us a much better room with a great view of the lights at Easton Towne Center. Taylor was empowered to correct this situation which is the way Conrad Hilton would have wanted it to be. I hope I can return and visit after the renovation and see how it comes out. I really wished we could have had some pool time but not on this years Christmas Party.

Sisters Dec16. Other than remodeling that was happening this is a gorgeous hotel. We were charged for Valet parking that we did not use so make certain to check your bill. There was also a bar charge on our bill. We did not go to the bar. One phone call and both of these items were taken off my bill and credited to my account.
They were doing some major renovations but they were super accommodating otherwise.

Gorgeous rooms. My husband and I stayed here for one evening during the current renovation Dec 2016. The signage was well marked for the alternate entrance while the main lobby is unavailable. The room renovation was complete and our junior suite was wonderful. We liked the layout the bathroom was spacious and the second sink large vanity outside the main bath was so convenient. The furnishings were modern inviting and comfortable. The bed was perfect and the new bathroom features were clean and functional. We look forward to returning once the renovation is complete. This location is convenient to shopping and dining perfect for a couple or family get away. All the staff members we interacted with were very pleasant and accommodating.

Great location. This is the second stay at this hotel in Easton. We travel quite frequently here for long weekends. Once the renovation is completed this hotel will be our favorite. it is the closest to an upscale hotel in the area. The rooms are typical 3 4 star appointed rooms. You are walking distance to the shopping. Friendly staff. Location friendly staff.

My favorite hotel when visiting Columbus. Always clean. Friendly and helpful staff. And even during the renovations the service is top notch. The rooms are so clean and the bed so comfortable. Location is fantastic. Right off 270E Lots of good places to eat within walking distance. Great shopping if you want to shop. Nothing the recent renovations are really making the Hilton Easton fantastic.

Under Construction. We new the hotel had been under construction but we thought it was finished. Although our room was renovated and very nice the rest of the hotel was still under renovation. As we have stayed at this hotel twice before and were very happy with the restaurant and lounge areas and the hotel is close to the shops we chose it for my birthday get away. We envisaged returning after shopping on a very cold day and sitting by the fireplace in the lounge to enjoy a cocktail. However the public areas were still under construction and there was only a temporary bar and dining area. We decided to go to the bar for a drink although it did not look like a comfortable area. We sat at the bar and waited to be served but we were ignored by the two people behind the bar. We took our coats off and made ourselves comfortable but no one attempted to serve us so we left. The next morning my husband went down to the same area to get coffee and a pastry for me. The same thing happened and no one was willing to assist him until he gave up and left when they pursued him but he was so disgusted with being ignored that he left and we checked out of the hotel to get breakfast somewhere else. The room. The location is perfect for shopping at Easton Town Center. offer less expensive rooms while the hotel is under construction.

Very nice but under renovation. Great location and friendly staff. Some of the amenities were inoperative due to renovations. I stayed in a spacious 2 queen room overlooking the valet parking area. The room was very clean and everything functioned. The bed was comfortable and the linens were plush. I ate at a dinner event in a ballroom and the food was 910 for presentation and service 710 for freshness quality and 510 for taste. Ultimately the facility was very nice and its proximity to the mall was advantageous. The best aspect was the gracious staff who get an A for making me feel welcome. Once the fitness center and other areas back on line it will likely earn a rating of 5 again.

Easton Hotel. Great Location room decor bathroom size overall property layout. Knew it was under renovation but it was more of an inconvenience in terms of missing services facilities than expected Front desk young lady was eating chewing while she was talking with me rude.

Keeps getting better and already top notch. Excellent hotel facilities in room in a great location in Columbus. Near great shopping restaurants and most everything in the Columbus area. They now have check in the day before by email and unlock your door with your iPhone. Always clean comfortable and first class. Highly recommended even after multiple visits. They are currently updating areas of the hotel to make it even better. Terrific staff.

RENOVATION MESS. UNFRIENDLY STAFF. Booked to stay one night Tuesday. Upon arrival doorman and staff did not greet. Due to renovation check in counter was as if curbside check in. Fortunate for them it was a slow evening. The check in process was horrible. I booked through a third party under my husbands travel partner the room was prepaid with my card due to a hotel policy they are not able to check me in because my husband did not accompany me. I stayed three nights at a Hilton in Nashville a week prior again through a third party my husband DID NOT accompany me and I did not have this check in issue or hotel policy thrown at my face. I told them I would not be able to get a hold of my husband he was in a meeting at time of my checking in. I also stated that I am a Hilton Honor and would be happy to cancel the other reservation and re booked but because hotel policy the room booked was non refundable. I was SOL. They had me wait and would not check me in until they heard from my husband. He eventually called back and the manager Carie got on the phone and did not ask for his name or verified who he was she went straight to stating the hotel policy that they could not check me in without his authorization. He could have been my boss. The white sheets were rough and dingy. The toilet did not flush due to a water line being worked on during the renovation. If I needed to use the restroom I had to walk to a nearby shopping district to use the public restroom. Horrible. The manager Carie and her staff need to do better. I will NOT stay at this particular establishment. POORLY managed.

Mixed emotions. Easy access to lots of restaurants and business easy access to expressway. The hotels was in the middle of renovations which is not terrible but inconvenient. However to top things off thought I was getting a deal through the website only to find I was being charged atleast 50 More for a room that I could have booked the day before for much less. So that on top of all the construction I could say I would not book this place again and probably not with this website.

The location was convenient for shopping and dining. Self parking was easy safe and free. Our suite was nt ready as we arrived early but we checked our luggage and went over to Easton Town Center. We had email notifaction when our room was ready so check in was simple. I use the digital key and just had to confirm the card on file. The concierge room was nt open yet due to the remodel so they explained where breakfast was. Our room was a junior suite and very comfortable. It was just two of us but nice to have extra room. The room was clean and had plenty outlets for both electric and USB plugs. it is nice to see hotels finally picking up on that. The only complaint was that guests would leave room service items in the hall and they would be there overnight well into late morning. I have that general complaint with a lot hotels though as I think not doing regular checks would draw unwanted critters.

Great place for business or fun. Great property and great location. Clean hotel with everything you need within a short walk. Also close to the CMH airport. I have visited this hotel many times and it has never disappointed. Throughout the years they continuously do improvements and renovations. Recommend.

Conference Stay at the Hilton. I have been a guest of this hotel multiple times for an annual conference. For check in this time I tried the digital key through the Hilton ap. I got an error message so I ended up having to go to the desk anyways. They ended up fixing it right away and gave me regular key cards as a backup. I was fortunate to walk right up for check in no long lines like I have experienced in the past. Part of using the digital key was choosing my room. I love that feature. I was able to see the floor plans and select a room location based on my preferences. LOVE THIS. My room was on the 5th floor close but not too close to the elevators near the conference center. PerfectThe Wifi worked much better this time than previous visits. Air conditioning was working fine no issues. past issues w being too hot. My room was also VERY clean. I was really happy to see the attention to detail that was seemingly missed in the past. Updated phones finally too. I like the quick serve convenience type store in the lobby. Quick service when I was there on a short time schedule. The lobby bar had the absolute best mojitos that I have had in a long time. Service was a bit slow at times but the drinks were worth it for sure. Checkout was also a breeze no issues and an emailed receipt. The only thing that would improve this would be not having to go to the desk honestly. Overall I enjoyed this stay more than past stays. It is nice that the remodeling is finished and it seems like the attention to detail has improved.

Great amenities steps away from the Mall. I arrived at around 9 pm on a Sunday night and was overjoyed that room service was still available. These are things that make a business traveler beyond happy and grateful that you get our needs. let us be honest I was also beyond excited to see they support local vendors. like Jenis ice cream in their freezer YAS. Also nice bistro with carry away alcoholic beverages bar. wonderful amenities you really do not have to leave if you do not want to. Next time I look forward to checking out the workout room and Executive Lounge for breakfast etcThe rooms are clean and still appear relatively updated though the shower could use some love just a little bit of wear and tear that could be cleaned up with caulking. Not a huge deal as I would definitely stay here again. Steps from Easton Mall which I so appreciated. Whole Foods close by and just so many restaurant options and shopping. Easy to park. This is my preferred Columbus hotel going forward.

Outside the overly crowded parking and having to walk a good distance to our room the hotel itself is always great for our needs. We have stayed at the Hilton several times and never leave complaining. And to wipe out the parking disappointment. I will give a star for early check in. Only had to wait 15 mins. upon arrival for our room. Most hotels now will make you wait until check in 3PM and later before accessing your room. One of the worst things is having to wait for a room when you arrive. we will text you when the room is ready Blah. Thank you for being respectful of our time and stay. Room was smaller than we normally get but recently renovated King eco friendly efficient room. Would certaintly stay again.
